page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: This is a stable area with most homes consisting of 2 parents and 2 or more children. Pets are popular: dogs, cats, horses, goats, hampsters, gerbils, budgerigars and poultry. Domestic activities include care of these pets, gardening, home decoration and home alteration. The level of safety in the home is high. Most families cook all their meals, growing some of their fruit and vegetables. A few families eat out occasionally and also buy convenience foods. Freezers are popular. in some large houses there might be a resident staff, including a cook. Most families are conscious of the cost and nutritive value of food with growing interest in wholefoods and vegetarianism. Home entertainment include T.V., radio, computer games, books, card games. Newspapers reach most homes daily.
